author: SciShow
description:
Visit https://brilliant.org/scishow/ to get started learning STEM for free. The first 200 people will get 20% off their annual premium subscription and a 30-day free trial.

Do you dream in color? For part of the 20th century, it was so rare, psychologists thought it meant something was wrong with you. For a generation, people dreamed in black and white, and TV might be to blame.

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: The Generation That Dreamed in Black and White
